project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Project Context & Role Clarity
sections.goal: Understand the interviewee's ownership within Orion Edge Gateway and their interaction with other teams
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your responsibilities in Orion Edge Gateway?
How do you coordinate with Platform and Security teams during the build phase?
What are the key success metrics you track for this project?

sections.title: Requirements & Stakeholder Management
sections.goal: Explore how requirements are gathered, prioritized, and validated with stakeholders
sample_questions: What process do you follow to capture API gateway requirements from regulated industry clients?
How do you balance conflicting priorities between rate limiting and low latency requirements?
Can you provide an example of a requirement that evolved significantly from initial capture to implementation?

sections.title: Technical Integration & Dependencies
sections.goal: Understand cross-project dependencies and integration points
sample_questions: How does Orion Edge Gateway integrate with Aegis IAM for auth?
What are the dependencies on Poseidon Networking for mTLS setup?
How do you coordinate release schedules with dependent teams?

sections.title: Risk Management & Compliance
sections.goal: Discuss how risks, especially in regulated environments, are identified and mitigated
sample_questions: What compliance considerations are critical for Orion Edge Gateway?
Can you share how you handle incidents like the MTLS handshake bug (GW-4821)?
How do you ensure adherence to POL-SEC-001 during development?

sections.title: Performance & SLA Management
sections.goal: Explore monitoring, performance tuning, and meeting SLA targets
sample_questions: How do you ensure SLA-ORI-02 p95 latency < 120ms is met?
What is your approach to load testing before production release?
Can you describe a performance bottleneck and how it was resolved?

sections.title: Tradeoffs & Decision Making
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee makes tradeoffs under constraints
sample_questions: Describe a major tradeoff you made between security and performance.
What factors influenced the decision to adopt Blue/Green deployments (RB-GW-011)?
How do you decide when to escalate an issue versus deferring it?
